subject: Re: [junit] OT: OO Newcomer

messageBody:
At 10:53 AM 12/13/02 -0500, you wrote:
>..
>I would like to ask the people on this list for recommendations of the best
>literature to bring an OO newbie up to speed.

i like this one: "Object-Oriented Design Heuristics" by Arthur J. Riel
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/020163385X

when i was teaching a course in ooad, this is what many of the students
were mising.

hth
